thread.title: Moideen still resides within, says RS Vimal
thread.title_full: Moideen still resides within, says RS Vimal - The Times of India

author: Deepika Jayaram
title: Moideen still resides within, says RS Vimal
text:
Heart wrenching love stories have always struck a chord with the viewers- whether it is Romeo-Juliet, Heer- Ranjha or the like.
Malayali's very own ethereal love story of Moideen and Kanchanamala has been eternalized by RS Vimal's portrayal of the lovers' world through his directorial venture Ennu Ninte Moideen.
The motif of intermittent rains added to the aura of the spotless love of Moideen and Kanchanamala, thereby enhancing the cathartic effect. In a recent interview, the director says that like in the film, Moideen's story still rains within him, and he would think of another movie, once it subsides, says the director.
